tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.24
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False isArrayMASK False output_data_MASKED $output_data_MASKED name SAGA.grid_tools.24 GRID $GRID MASK $MASK prefer $prefer response $response outputType_MASKED $OutputSection_MASKED.outputType_MASKED transmissionMode_MASKED $OutputSection_MASKED.transmissionMode_MASKED

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: MASK
param.label: Mask
param.help: Mask The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_MASKED
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MASKED
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Cells of the input grid will be set to no-data, if their cell center lies outside or within a no-data cell of the mask grid.
